embed.title: ## {username} is here!
embed.desc:
helloo i'm {username}, your all-in-one cutie bot 
i was born on `27/05/2022` and since then i've been growing with lots of lovee 

my amazing onii-chan is **kenndeclouv** >,<, you can dm them if you need help, wanna talk tech stuff, or even collab on something cool!

i love making your server more fun, organized, and cozy! from utilities to cute interactions, i'll always try to make things easier and sweeter for you ><

wanna invite me to your server or check out my website? just click the buttons below and letâ€™s be friends!

options.title: Clear Channel Options
options.desc: Choose how you want to clear the channel. You can nuke (clone & delete) or bulk delete all messages.

bulk.value: Deletes all messages that can be bulk deleted (from the last 14 days).

welcome.desc:
## ğŸ‰ Thank you for inviting me!
Hello everyone! I'm **{bot}** and I'm ready to help your server!

Here are some steps to get started:
â€¢ Use `/help` to see all my features and commands.
â€¢ Configure your server settings with `/set view` (admin only).
â€¢ Visit my website at [kythia.my.id](https://kythia.my.id/commands) for documentation and more info.

If you need help, just mention me or contact my owner `kenndeclouv`!
welcome.fallback:

Hello everyone! I'm **{bot}** and I'm ready to help your server!
